results.name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance
results.description:
This was only tested in Software Rendering Mode.
GOG Version (1.0 hotfix)
results.notes: After starting the game you have to set rendering to software mode in the game options. If the menu appears completely black pressing the ESC key will make you see so you can navigate to the options menu.
results.content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/mgsi.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game
installer:
- task:
    args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/game"
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
wine:
  overrides:
    ddraw.dll: n,b
    dinput.dll: n,b
